title: Salesforce Extends AI Reach With Army Deal And Wildfire Initiative
title_zh: Salesforce 通过陆军交易和野火计划扩大人工智能范围
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to modernize operations and support AI deployment across military personnel.
summary_zh: Salesforce（纽约证券交易所股票代码：CRM）与美国陆军签订了一份价值 5.6 亿美元、为期 10 年的合同，旨在实现运营现代化并支持军事人员的人工智能部署。

title: FTEC Offers Broader Tech Exposure Than XLK, But There's a Hidden Downside
title_zh: FTEC 提供比 XLK 更广泛的技术展示，但有一个隐藏的缺点
summary: Explore how two popular tech ETFs differ in diversification, holdings, and risk -- key factors for building a resilient portfolio.
summary_zh: 探索两种受欢迎的科技 ETF 在多元化、持有量和风险方面有何不同，这些是构建弹性投资组合的关键因素。

title: Microsoft Perplexity AI Deal Tests Azure Growth And Spending Concerns
title_zh: 微软 Perplexity AI 交易考验 Azure 增长和支出担忧
summary: Microsoft has signed a three year, $750 million multi cloud AI infrastructure deal with Perplexity, centered on Azure. The agreement positions Azure as a core platform for hosting advanced AI models from partners such as OpenAI, Anthropic, and xAI.
summary_zh: 微软与 Perplexity 签署了一份为期三年、价值 7.5 亿美元的多云人工智能基础设施协议，以 Azure 为中心。该协议将 Azure 定位为托管 OpenAI、Anthropic 和 xAI 等合作伙伴的高级 AI 模型的核心平台。

title: Salesforce Expands Into Defense And Wildfire AI With Long Term Deals
title_zh: Salesforce 通过长期交易扩展到国防和野火人工智能领域
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to support digital modernization and AI enablement. The company also launched EMBERPOINT LLC, a wildfire response venture with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo.
summary_zh: Salesforce（纽约证券交易所股票代码：CRM）与美国陆军签订了一份价值 5.6 亿美元、为期 10 年的合同，以支持数字现代化和人工智能支持。该公司还与洛克希德·马丁公司、PG&E 和富国银行合作成立了 EMBERPOINT LLC，这是一家野火应对企业。

title: Minivan sales surge 21% in 2025 as millennial dads lead demand for cars offering the 'best bang for your buck'
title_zh: 千禧一代的爸爸们引领了对“物超所值”汽车的需求，2025 年小型货车销量将猛增 21%
summary: Most carmakers are only focused on the truck and SUV buyer, but one model saw a surge in popularity last year — the trusty family minivan.
summary_zh: 大多数汽车制造商只关注卡车和 SUV 买家，但去年有一款车型人气飙升——值得信赖的家庭小型货车。
